Name: Limey Mule
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Made with plain vodka this drink is a Moscow Mule. This variant uses lime flavoured vodka.
History: A detailed history of the Moscow Mule cocktail , of which this drink is a variant, can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Limey Mule contains 95 calories
